sentences.chinese: “它們是令人驚異的動物，”羅賓遜說。

sentences.english: Robinson was awarded the Presidential Medal of Freedom by Obama in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜2009年接受了奧巴馬頒發的總統自由勳章。
檢察官德魯羅賓遜驚呆了。

sentences.english: Thee Robinsons love seeing the world.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜一家喜歡周遊世界。

sentences.english: The main helicopter used in the club is Robinson R44.
sentences.chinese: 在這個社團中最主要的飛機是羅賓遜R44直升飛機。

sentences.english: Robison says human activities threaten all of these.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜說人類活動已經威脅到了它們全體的生命。

sentences.english: One day Robinson Crusoe espied a foot print on the sand.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，羅賓遜克魯斯看到沙灘上有腳印。

sentences.english: Controls are more serious than those of Robinson.
sentences.chinese: 控制系統也比羅賓遜的飛機更嚴謹。

sentences.english: The Robinsons lived in a brick bungalow on the South Side of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜一家住在芝加哥城南部的一個街區平房裏。

sentences.english: Robinson watches. He's spent 15 years among the spirit bears.
sentences.chinese: 儘管羅賓遜已經和白靈熊在一起生活了15年了。

sentences.english: Robinson declined to offer details on coverage under the company’s final offer.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜拒絕在公司最後的議案下達前提供任何細節。

sentences.english: 'Work on not working, ' says Dr. Robinson.
sentences.chinese: 磎“努力做到不工作，”羅賓遜說。

sentences.english: Both stand 6ft 4in and could replace Robinson in the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 他們身高都是6尺4寸，可以在半程代替羅賓遜。

sentences.english: We have to put the Robinsons off until Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我們只好把與羅賓遜家的約會推遲到星期六。

sentences.english: All he had to worry about was whether to have an affair with Mrs Robinson.
sentences.chinese: 他所考慮的只是要不要和羅賓遜夫人私通。

sentences.english: The Mrs Robinsons aren't sitting around at home any more, seducing graduates.
sentences.chinese: 羅賓遜夫人不再呆在家裏勾引畢業生。

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
